title: Betty J. Young, 72
content:
, of Rapid City, passed away Tuesday, Sept. 15, 2015. 
  
Betty was born Oct. 3, 1942, in Bayard, Neb., to David and Ruth (Britthauer) Trout. 
      
Betty was married to Ruben “Kenny” Young Dec. 6, 1958, in Rapid City. Survivors include sons; Bill Young of Black Hawk, Dennis Young, and Rick Young, of Montana; a sister, Violet Butler; grandchildren, and great-grandchildren. Betty was preceded in death by her parents, husband Kenny Young, and sisters Rosie Heesch and Norma Neisent. 
 
A celebration of life will be 10 a.m., Wednesday, Sept. 23, at Black Hills Funeral Home. Burial will immediately follow at Black Hills National Cemetery located near Sturgis. 
 
Friends may sign the online guest register at www.blackhillsfuneralhome.com .
